channel.title: CVE Feed for momofoolish -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for momofoolish -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-39301|2024-08-03T12:00:44.045Z -- momofoolish -- sra-admin
item.description: sra-admin is a background rights management system that separates the front and back end. sra-admin version 1.1.1 has a storage cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability. After logging into the sra-admin background, an attacker can upload an html page containing xss attack code in "Personal Center" - "Profile Picture Upload" allowing theft of the user's personal information. This issue has been patched in 1.1.2. There are no known workarounds.
